name: TCBD Author URL Changer
author: Md Touhidul Sadeek

sections.description:
Authors in WordPress have a homepage url like http://domain.com/author/authorname where all their posts are shown. And many of us who think it doesn’t look attractive want to change that url format. This plugin help you to change that url format.

Before: http://domain.com/author/authorname

After: http://domain.com/Your_Custom_Word/authorname

Plugin Features

  • Easy to use.
  • Only 3 kb.
  • Customizable.
sections.installation:
Installation

  1. Upload ‘tcbd-author-url-changer’ folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq: • For more questions or help, contact me.

short_description: This plugin will enable change author url in your Wordpress theme.
